Title: Relates to standards for prompt, fair and equitable payments of insurance commissions or other compensation arrangements
Summary: Establishes standards for prompt, fair and equitable payments of insurance commissions or other compensation arrangements; provides penalties for failure to meet such standards.
LawCode: Amd ยง2119, add ยง3224-e, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to standards for prompt, fair and equitable payments of insurance commissions or other compensation arrangements
